Uses of Class
org.jnetpcap.SockAddr

Packages that use SockAddr
Package
Description
org.jnetpcap
The Packet Capture library provides a high level interface to packet capture systems.

  • Uses of SockAddr in org.jnetpcap

    Classes in org.jnetpcap with type parameters of type SockAddr
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    PcapIf.PcapAddr<T extends SockAddr>
    The struct pcap_addr structure containing network interfaces/devices addresses.
    Subclasses of SockAddr in org.jnetpcap
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    SockAddr.Inet6SockAddr
    Represents an IPv6 socket address (sockaddr_in6 structure).
    static final class 
    SockAddr.InetSockAddr
    Represents an IPv4 socket address (sockaddr_in structure).
    static final class 
    SockAddr.IpxSockAddr
    The structure of sockaddr_ipx, used for AF_IPX sockets.
    static final class 
    SockAddr.IrdaSockAddr
    The structure of sockaddr_irda, used with AF_IRDA sockets on windows (winsock2.h) to access link-layer information.
    static final class 
    SockAddr.LinkSockAddr
    The structure of sockaddr_dl, used with AF_LINK sockets on macOS to access link-layer information.
    static final class 
    SockAddr.PacketSockAddr
    The structure of sockaddr_ll, used with AF_PACKET sockets for raw packet access on Linux.

    PcapIf.findAddressOfType(Class<T> familyClassType)
    Searches for the first network address of a specific type.

    Description
    Optional<PcapIf.PcapAddr<? extends SockAddr>>
    PcapIf.findAddressOfFamily(SockAddrFamily family)
